translation.opcmes: In each Page change you can defined a URL to be matched against the next URL visited by the user. The Callback intent will be sent by the chat widget if this page is visited. Only the paths will be compared, and the host will be ignored. Which means that if you specify an url like http://localhost:5005/aaa/bbb it will also work for  https://yoursite.com/aaa/bbb. If none of the pages are visited, the Error intent will be triggered.
translation.obsintmes: In each Page Event you can defined a event to be added to the elements matching the selector. The payload will be sent by the chat widget as the event is triggered.
translation.erromes: If you enable page changes you should at least have one
translation.erromes1: One of your Page Changes listener has a URL or an Intent Callback missing
translation.erromes2: You are listening to page changes but the Error Intent is missing.
translation.erromes3: If you enable page Events you should at least have one
translation.erromes4: One of your Page Events listener has a selector, an event or a payload missing
translation.erromes5: You enabled Custom CSS but you did not set the css property
translation.erromes6: When enabling highlighting of elements on page, selector must be set.
